title: How to Get Around in Pixel Gun

steps.headline: Gain common knowledge of the map.
steps.description: Create your own custom match and choose the map. Run around the map for a while on the main roads until you understand the layout of the map. Castles, a very small map in flag capture is easy, although something like a pumpkin patch can be more difficult.

steps.headline: Equip with helpful tools.
steps.description: There are many inaccessible areas in Pixel Gun until you gain specific items. The ninja tabs allow you to double jump, a very useful and lifesaving skill. when running around, switch to your backup weapon fr more mobility. The gravity gun allows you to jump much higher than usual with a rocket jump, allowing access to many areas easily. Parkour city, a map with few pathways is much easier with these tools. Don't have the gravity gun? A simple signal pistol will do.

steps.headline: Find an overhead map.You can go to Google, and search for a map of the field.
steps.description: This is especially useful in maze-like maps such as pumpkin patch, and others.

steps.headline: In matches, you may be killed by spawn before you can move at all.
steps.description: To combat this, choose a disorienting skin for the map. Enable custom skins and make your own. For heaven's garden, a peach camo base and a light blue top is all you'll need.

text: Basics Gain common knowledge of the map. Create your own custom match and choose the map. Run around the map for a while on the main roads until you understand the layout of the map. Castles, a very small map in flag capture is easy, although something like a pumpkin patch can be more difficult. Equip with helpful tools. There are many inaccessible areas in Pixel Gun until you gain specific items. The ninja tabs allow you to double jump, a very useful and lifesaving skill. when running around, switch to your backup weapon fr more mobility. The gravity gun allows you to jump much higher than usual with a rocket jump, allowing access to many areas easily. Parkour city, a map with few pathways is much easier with these tools. Don't have the gravity gun? A simple signal pistol will do. Cheap strategies Find an overhead map.You can go to Google, and search for a map of the field. This is especially useful in maze-like maps such as pumpkin patch, and others. In matches, you may be killed by spawn before you can move at all. To combat this, choose a disorienting skin for the map. Enable custom skins and make your own. For heaven's garden, a peach camo base and a light blue top is all you'll need.
